titles.title: Service-Disabled Veterans Small Business Continuation Act
Service-Disabled Veterans Small Business Continuation Act
Service-Disabled Veterans Small Business Continuation Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to clarify the treatment of certain surviving spouses under the definition of small business concern owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Service-Disabled Veterans Small Business Continuation Act
This bill enables the surviving spouse of a service-disabled veteran who owned a small business to retain priority of the business for a period of time upon the death of the veteran spouse, regardless of the severity of the veteran's disability.
